nodes.text: Bylluran Athletic was a Sullustan bolo-ball team that was active during the waning days of the Galactic Republic. Around 21 BBY, Bylluran Athletic made it to a bolo-ball final. Clone Captain CT-7567 was a fan of the team and dyed his hair in the team color blue during the time of the final.
Bylluran Athletic was first mentioned in the 2009 novel The Clone Wars: No Prisoners written by Karen Traviss.
